N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 501.3 - Applicant within specified distance

State Regulations

Upon written application of the owner or occupant of any
property abutting on any such street, avenue, road or way or other public place
within the distance specified in section
501.4
(d) of this

Part of any main of a water-works corporation, appropriate to the service
requested, such water-works corporation shall furnish, place and construct at
its own cost and expense such mains, service pipes, service connections and
facilities as are necessary to render the service requested. Notes
